title: Razvijalec spletnih rešitev. Vaša ideje pretvorim v digitalni produkt.
description: Pomagam zagonskim, malim ter srednje velikim podjetjem pri zagonu in rasti njihovih digitalnih izdelkov.
mvp_desc: Specialized in MVP (Minimum Viable Product) development for startups, focusing on rapid, lean methodologies to bring innovative ideas to market swiftly.
eb_desc: With a deep understanding of modern web technologies and best practices, I design and develop websites and web applications that are robust, scalable, and user-friendly.
mobile_desc: My proficiency with Flutter allows for the development of visually striking and smooth-running apps, ensuring consistent user experiences across Android and iOS platforms.
